def_cn: 自相矛盾；有矛盾特点的情况
def_en: You describe a situation as a paradox when it involves two or more facts or qualities which seem to contradict each other.

def_cn: 悖论；自相矛盾的说法；似矛盾而（可能）正确的说法
def_en: A paradox is a statement in which it seems that if one part of it is true, the other part of it cannot be true.
